definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="item_cooldown_for"><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">40</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="item_damage"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><next><block type="projectile_shoot_from_entity"><value name="projectile"><block type="projectiles_arrow"><field name="projectile">CUSTOM:BlazeBall</field><field name="fire">TRUE</field><field name="particles">FALSE</field><field name="pickup">DISALLOWED</field><value name="damage"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><value name="knockback"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="piercing"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="shooter"><block type="entity_none"></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="inaccuracy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
